snippet: Teams are promoting themselves more creatively through Facebook, Instagram and Twitter, but struggling N.F.L. squads have learned that criticism from the disgruntled comes with the territory.
abstract: NFL teams are widening embrace of social media, employing people to find creative ways to inform and connect with their fan bases on platforms like Facebook, Instagram and Twitter; disgruntled fans of struggling or losing teams vent their dismay using same tools.
lead_paragraph: Teams are promoting themselves more creatively through Facebook, Instagram and Twitter, but struggling N.F.L. squads have learned that criticism from the disgruntled comes with the territory.

headline.seo: As N.F.L. Teams Exploit Social Media, Fans Respond, Not Always in Kind
headline.main: Win or Lose on Sunday, Social Media Is a Draw
headline.print_headline: Win or Lose, Teams Find Social Media Is a Draw
